snippet.title: A Rat's Quest // HandyGames Showcase 2024
snippet.description:
#ARatsQuest #ActionAdventure # HandyGamesShowcase2024

Mat is a young male rat who lives in a rat commune in an abandoned wine cellar with his best friend Toby and other rodents. Having fallen in love with Nat, a female house mouse kept as a pet on the upper floors, he decides to become a Scavenger, for sneaking to his beloved somehow officially. Coming from different worlds, they plan to escape to “the outside” together. His overconfidence however puts them in peril’s way, and not everything in the commune is as it seems.

In a series of unlucky events, Mat finds himself alone, far away from the house. He must make his way back home, overcoming a journey across woodlands, caves, and swamps, defying the overwhelming danger of a winged, poisonous, and scale-bond variety. With a rivet for a sword and nails as throwing daggers, Mat will brave a world to which he is unwelcome.

Help the Scavenger get back to his friends and save the rat commune from a threat that is bigger than every cheese in the world!

Music by Christophe Kalkau

#HandyGames #IndieGames #germanpublisher 

by http://www.handy-games.com. ▶
